person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: First run leaders Guenther Huber and breakman Antonio Tartaglia in the Italy I sleigh finished second two-hundredths of a second behind the Americans .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Guenther Huber |
| Antonio Tartaglia |
| the Americans |

Explanation:

* "Guenther Huber" is a person, mentioned as one of the leaders of the first run.
* "Antonio Tartaglia" is also a person, mentioned as the breakman of the Italian team.
* "the Americans" is a group of people, mentioned as the team that finished first in the race.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| Guenther Huber |
| Antonio Tartaglia |
| the Americans |

Explanation:

* "Guenther Huber" is a person, mentioned as one of the leaders of the first run.
* "Antonio Tartaglia" is also a person, mentioned as the breakman of the Italian team.
* "the Americans" is a group of people, mentioned as the team that finished first in the race.

Note: I assume that "the Americans" refers to the members of the American bobsleigh team, so I have included it as a valid entity. If it is not clear from the context that "the Americans" refers to specific individuals, then it would not be a valid "Person" entity.
